q: ( Reuters)- United Parcel Service, the world's largest package delivery company, reported a quarterly profit that beat estimates and forecast record-high profits in 2011, sending its shares up 4 percent. In less than two years from the recession, they already think they can exceed peak earnings, said BB&T analyst Kevin Sterling. Yesterday, in responding to a question... SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as`` shyster loans. `` Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern,'' CEO Sergio Marchionne

Eric Schmidt drew fire for responding to a hypothetical question posed at a forum in Washington, DC, about an implant that would let Google Inc. know what its users were thinking. He responded that Google Inc. 's policy is to get right up to the creepy line and not cross it , and an implant would cross the line. He also said that as users voluntarily share information online, it doesn't need users to type in search queries for the company to tailor the results.
